ygData.subject: Re: Iron Fist and Alliance Base Security
ygData.msgSnippet: My computer quit on me as I was answering messages Sunday, if I miss anything let me know. I ll start with Yans post first. Recklessa swirls out of the way of

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

My computer quit on me as I was answering messages Sunday, if I miss
anything let me know. I'll start with Yans post first.

Recklessa swirls out of the way of the shots, even though they
probably wouldn't have hit anyways. She speeds up, firing two more
missiles at Prebon.

Prebon lets the missles hit him forcing him into the water below.

Fenox speeds up, above the ocean and heading for the Iron Fist. She
knew they wouldn't lower the shields untill Prebon was taken care of,
but the missile launchers and laser turrets would take care of that
nicely.

Missles and lasers flaired around him like sparks from a campfire. he
swerved and dodged avoiding the higher power blasts. he waited till a missle
was close and blasted it causing an explosion close enough to him to disrupt
any sensors until the smoke cleared. he swam after Fenox hoping the alliance
would mistake the missle debris for his remains but his sensors were messed
up too so he couldn't tell.

Starlight continues after Prebon, firing four more charges at him.

Charges exploded around him, he couldn't know if they were fired before the
explosion or after. Until his scanner was back up he couldn't know.

Prebon kept working his way under the water following Fenox's wake. he knew
it would be difficult to avoid sensors for very long but for now he had
enough disturbance from the bot above him to be safe for the moment. He
stayed alert for activity, he knew that moments can change at a moments
notice.

----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 14, 2001 9:55 AM
Subject: Iron Fist and Alliance Base Security


> Jaws:
>
>
>
> The great white shark took out his rifle shaped like a few foot long
shark,
> walking towards where Prebon was, but could only see him on sensors, he
> wasn't even half way there yet.  He switched the weapon mode on his weapon
to
> grenades.  No one was going to defeat the Alliance, especially the bases.
>
>
>
